name: The Mountain Shadow
description:
This is a direct sequel to Under the Black Mountain! It is recommended you play that game first!

--

The little witch wakes up somewhere she's never seen before. Use your elemental spells to adventure through two puzzling dungeons and fight the dangerous bosses that await you at the end!

A deadly bug which makes it impossible to respawn makes this game very difficult. You can play the fixed version here, but your rating should be base on the submitted version. Didn't get to playtest! :(

--KNOWN BUGS--

  • Death is permanent. WOOPS!
  • Final boss health bar doesn't fill out properly.
  • The final spell doesn't break pots or chests.
  • One of the second boss' attacks deals no damage.
  • Spider hitboxes are busted.
  • Ending is cut off by the thank you screen.
  • Keys carry over after death, not that it matters
